      • run

        public void run()
        Runs through the buffers of all the clients connected to see if they have send anything. If clients have send anything process them accordingly.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(ClientHandler client)
        If you want a client removed you use this method. It will remove the client when the server is not busy scrolling through the clients.
        Parameters:
        client - - The client you want removed
